meanings.sent1: My dads always take me fishing on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Many kids look up to their dads for guidance and support.
meanings.sent3: The dads at the park were all cheering for their children during the race.
meanings.sent4: In the animal kingdom, lion dads are known for their protective nature.
meanings.sent5: The image of dads playing catch with their kids is a classic symbol of fatherhood.

meanings.definition: Dad: to act as a father to; to be the father of
meanings.sent1: He dads his children with love and care.
meanings.sent2: My uncle dads his nieces and nephews whenever he visits.
meanings.sent3: The dog dads the little kittens as if they were her own.
meanings.sent4: She dads the neighborhood kids by teaching them how to ride bikes.
meanings.sent5: The teacher dads her students by providing guidance and support in their learning journey.
